description: With use vmware center dirver in nova, and set flat_injected = True to static inject pure IPv6, from code, this function still not be implemented, but it shoud not throw excepption, when the network_info is one pure IPv6 information, it will impact nova compute service work.
title: Static injection pure IPv6 address will throw exception in vmware driver

comments.content: With use vmware center dirver in nova, and set flat_injected = True to static inject pure IPv6, from code, this function still not be implemented, but it shoud not throw excepption, when the network_info is one pure IPv6 information, it will impact nova compute service work.

Branch:    master

commit 60627ad73703c4f2258b21c8741edc22d8c8224d
Author: Dazhao <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Feb 28 16:31:39 2014 +0800

    vmwareapi:Fix nova compute service down issue when injecting pure IPv6
    
    Use vmware center driver to static inject pure IPv6 address, since
    IPv6 injection function still not be implemented, but it should not
    throw exception, it will impact nova compute service work
    
    Change-Id: I8d0835623202d48466a97798312b67f049ffb6c8
    Closes-Bug: #1286006
